welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Ojus, a charming city known for its beautiful parks and friendly community. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer - from local cuisine to outdoor adventures."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at North Perry Airport serves as the hub for all commercial flights and provides a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at North Perry Airport caters to private and charter flights, offering a range of services and facilities for pilots and their passengers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fort Lauderdale Executive Airport serves as the hub for all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Fort Lauderdale Executive Airport caters to private and corporate jets, offering a luxurious and exclusive experience.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport and can be accessed for free by selecting the network and entering a valid email address.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The secondary terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The terminal for low-cost carriers and regional flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The newest terminal for domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pompano Beach Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Pompano Beach Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Executive Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
